manticore
Class Application

java.lang.Object
  manticore.Application

public class Application
extends java.lang.Object

Application represents a Java application using the 3-tier design pattern.

Constructor Summary
Application()
          Application constructor.

          Add a controller in the business layer without using reflection.

Constructor Detail

Application

public Application()
Application constructor.

Parameters:
appPkg - Application package used to find the business controllers
Method Detail

init

public void init()
Initializes the application. This method basically initializes the presentation layer which can start making requests to the business.

setDataController

public void setDataController(JAXBDataController data)
Sets the controller of the data layer. This data controller is injected to the business controllers on creation.

Parameters:
data - The controller of the data layer

addPresentation

public void addPresentation(PresentationController presentation)
Adds a presentation controller to the presentation layer. This operation injects the business controllers of the application to the presentation controller.

Parameters:
presentation - The presentation controller

addBusiness

public void addBusiness(java.lang.Class<? extends BusinessController> controllerClass)
Uses reflection to add business controllers to the business layer dinamically! Every controller is injected with the data controller when constructed.

Parameters:
controllerClass - Class of the business controller

addBusiness

public void addBusiness(BusinessController controller)
Add a controller in the business layer without using reflection.

Parameters:
controller - The business controller
